## kvatch init

Initialise local Kvatch workspace

### Synopsis

Sets up kvatch in local mode with a SQLite database and default config.

```
kvatch init [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for init
```

```
  -o, --output string   Output format: json|text (default "text")
```
